pthread_t __signal_thread

Detailed Description

Signal handling for the whole process

Date:
2009-04-22
Author:
Jean-Lou Dupont
This module confines all signals from the process to the handler thread: signals are then dispatched to all interested subscribers through litm.

Definition in file signals.c.
